comments.content:
Ramiro   
   
That guy at LAVA in Amsterdam who's email address I sent you a few weeks back would be handy to talk to about that. They design lots of magazines.   
   
Jim

Well, it's not magazines, but here are a couple of newspaper resources (text is a big concern)   
   
1. Poynter Institute   
2. Society for News Design (Their member magazine has good content.)
